titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily suspend the duty on mercuric oxide.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on mercuric oxide.
